In this exercise, we have some more hands-on on Tableau.

-   The dashboard consists of several charts. One of the charts has a chart in the tooltip. You can view it [here](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/vanessa.heng/viz/In-class_Exercise03-Dashboard/Dashboard1).

![](images/clipboard-2381277502.png)

-   Create a story to tell the message to the audience. You can view it [here](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/vanessa.heng/viz/In-class_Exercise03-Story/Story1).

![](images/clipboard-4271125096.png)

-   Making charts interactive with other charts. You can view it [here](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/vanessa.heng/viz/In-ClassExercise03-MathsvsEnglishScatterplotBoxplot/Dashboard1).
